fields.body: Once you have entered your details, you will be given the option to save a document with your quotation details. If you have any questions, please get in touch with us at: info@openbookcollective.org

fields.body: You can choose to support OBC initiatives for either 12 (1 year) or 36 months (3 years). For 36 months terms, annual prices are fixed at the Annual Cost displayed above. By default, we request payment for subscriptions on an annual basis, however if preferred we can alternatively issue a payment request for the full subscription amount.

fields.body: You can choose to support OBC initiatives for either 12 (1 year) or 36 months (3 years). For 36 months terms, annual prices are fixed at the Annual Cost displayed above. By default, we request payment for subscriptions on an annual basis, however if preferred we can alternatively issue a payment request for the full subscription amount. You can set the term length on the next page.
